title: WM Revolutionary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Hold an anonymous council each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night you are alive, all other Town members in the game will be able to send a vote to your council. You may also vote in your council.
- Players may cast their vote for any other living player in the game, or abstain. If a player does not send in a vote, they will abstain.
- If a majority of the votes are cast for one player, you will attack them. You will know the name of the player you attack.
- If a majority of the votes abstain, you will attack no one.
- Votes for you will not count towards the majority in your council.
- When you attack a player, you will gain roleblock and redirect immunity.
- If there is a tie, you will be the final deciding vote. If you voted for a target that is not one of the majority votes, you will attack no one.
- If you kill a member of the Town, you will no longer hold your councils.
